thread.title: Watch Five Abandoned Lions Feel Grass for the First Time
thread.title_full: Watch Five Abandoned Lions Feel Grass for the First Time

title: Watch Five Abandoned Lions Feel Grass for the First Time
text:
> Entertainment Watch Five Abandoned Lions Feel Grass for the First Time After a lifetime in captivity six lions were able to feel grass under their paws for the first time thanks to Four Paws International. The nonprofit saved five of the lions from an abandoned Romanian
